snippet: Bang on a Can, the iconoclastic new-music collective, performed at Alice Tully Hall on Saturday in the run-up to its annual marathon, which is coming in June.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by new-music collective Bang on a Can at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Bang on a Can, the iconoclastic new-music collective, performed at Alice Tully Hall on Saturday in the run-up to its annual marathon, which is coming in June.

headline.seo: Bang on a Can Plays Evan Ziporyn and Others at Tully Hall
headline.main: Keeping the Vision New for 25 Years
headline.print_headline: Keeping the Vision New for 25 Years
